title: Attitudes Towards Technology (ATI) Scale
prompt: Please indicate your agreement with each of the following statements.
statements: I feel comfortable using technology in my daily life., I am open to using new technology., I believe technology improves productivity., I find it easy to adapt to new technology., I prefer traditional methods over technology., I believe technology makes tasks more complicated.
matrix_options: Strongly Disagree, Disagree, Slightly Disagree, Slightly Agree, Agree, Strongly Agree
